name: Les villes cachées de la Republique Démocratique du Congo
name_original: Les villes cachées de la Republique Démocratique du Congo
description:
Practice finding the cities of the Democratic Republic of the Congo with this short game.
Recommended to play in full screen.

Features:

  • Play in a number of languages: English, French, Kikongo, Kingwana (Swahili), Lingala, Mashi, and Tshiluba.
  • Includes audio and written prompts in each language.

This game is in development.
